column4: Hi everyone, i have recently done a fedora 10 installation on my previous Win XP C:. I would now require to update my /boot/grub/menu.lst file in my Ubuntu 8.10. my disk partition details are http://paste.ubuntu.com/77437/. Can anyone guie me as to what lines i need to add for booting the fedora 10.
